1364:13: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvā'dhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe|
1364:14: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarāmiṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisattvasya kaḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā|
1364:17: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau|
1364:18: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate||3||
1364:19: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tatsādhayati parārthamātmano'tyarthaṃ saṃtāpanāt|
1364:24: tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ||5||
1364:25: trividhe sattvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrastheḥ trayodaśavidho bodhisattvasya parārthaḥ|
1364:35: saha tathāgatajñānenetyeṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisattvasya|
1364:38: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā||6||
1364:39: yathā'sau parārthapatipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati|
1364:50: na hyadūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ|
1364:54: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ|
1364:55: pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ||7||
1364:56: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām|
1364:57: sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim||8||
1364:61: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkhamevāpnoti|
1364:62: bodhisattvastu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnotyayamasyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ|
1364:64: yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ|
1364:66: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisattvaḥ pravartate|
1364:67: īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānastena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanairhitārthaṃ sattveṣu tatsarvamabhisaṃskaroti|
1364:71: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ||10||
1364:72: sadā kleśairasvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣamupaiti bodhisattvaḥ|
1364:80: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhāmabhibhūyagamanāt|
1364:82: rūpaṃ cetsubhūta[te] bhāvo 'bhaviṣyannābhāvo nedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokamabhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ|
